name: Robin Austin
text: I have never had bad service at the Brockport restaurant. The pan pizza  is my favorite.  I have also had the pasta dishes and liked those too. It's  not just a pizza place. You can have a complete meal, including desert.

text: They have the best pizza there is and they have been a favorite comfort food dinner out since my son was a little guy.

name: Will Aley
text: Since there aren't any pizza huts left in the buffalo area we drove an hour to Brockport to get pizza. Definitely worth the drive and was hot and fresh just as quick as it should be .

text: All the charm of an old school parts store with every part you could ever need. The staff is very knowledgeable, nice and have counter smarts. Great place!

text: Waiter was very friendly & attentive, worked efficiently, quick, accurate & there when we needed him, for our small group that ordered several apps, pizzas, drinks & to-go orders along with our dine-in foods. Food was delicious and timely. Today's experience was perfect.
